title: Extends powers of municipal corporations to acquire public utilities by the power of eminent domain
summary: Extends the powers of municipal corporations to establish, own and operate public utility services by the power of eminent domain; provides that municipal corporations need not make a final decision on the acquisition of assets until the value of such assets has been determined.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to the acquisition of property by eminent domain
